channel.title: publisher of indie games on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in publisher of indie games on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 tinyBuild Games Logo
tinyBuild Inc. is an American publisher of indie games based in Bellevue, Washington. The company was established by Alex Nichiporchik and Tom Brien in 2011 to expand Brien’s game No Time to Explain into a commercial release. Building from the success of the game’s Steam release in 2013, tinyBuild partnered with DoubleDutch Games for the development and release of SpeedRunners, which landed tinyBuild further publishing deals. Since March 2020, the company has been founding or acquiring new studios to expand.
You can download thetinyBuildlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: tinyBuild
item.description: tinyBuild Inc. is an American publisher of indie games based in Bellevue, Washington. The company was established by Alex Nichiporchik and Tom Brien in 2011 to expand Brien’s game No Time to Explain into a commercial release. Building from the success of the game’s Steam release in 2013, tinyBuild partnered with DoubleDutch Games for the development and release of SpeedRunners, which landed tinyBuild further publishing deals. Since March 2020, the company has been founding or acquiring new studios to expand.
